title: 你们的网课怎么上的？
author: 罗bibi
txt_content:
抽烟的小伙子们举个手
吃东西的举个手
打游戏的举个手
认真听课的举个手

悄悄逛BBS的举个脚

replies.author: BiggayJN
replies.txt_content: 空中课堂

replies.author: 梦··
replies.txt_content: 打游戏的

replies.author: 洞穴夜莺
replies.txt_content: 一边听课一边水回复

replies.author: MMMMAX
replies.txt_content: 与滗方便，与我方便
坐着上的

replies.author: 独行
replies.txt_content: 一边听课 一边在服务器里钓鱼

replies.author: 混沌魔龙
replies.txt_content: 举个臭脚

replies.author: 小马哥win
replies.txt_content: 花城+
没有网课的我，只需要写文案~

replies.author: 云枫寄寒枭
replies.txt_content: 举jio顺便表示我是睡觉

replies.author: 索菲缇娅
replies.txt_content:
抽烟的可还行

反正没怎么听...

具体可以看贴：https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-1002674-1-1.html
这个人素质很低！！！！！！！
注意了！！！！

replies.author: Fucker_hank
replies.txt_content: 躺着上 有时候 躺着就睡着了

replies.author: j19950909
replies.txt_content: 没上过网课!能分享一下感觉么?

replies.author: 曦灬月
replies.txt_content: 边听边氵

replies.author: jbgkn678
replies.txt_content: 上网课是表情严肃，一下课变成祖安人

replies.author: dsadwioitgi
replies.txt_content: 当然是打游戏啦

replies.author: ROdin
replies.txt_content: 左面挂机右面MC，要么就自动钓鱼，手机看课

replies.author: 野生考拉
replies.txt_content: 上网课这么久了结果我只能做到前两个字

replies.author: 归零photon
replies.txt_content: 边听网课边打mc 摸鱼现场

replies.author: kidozh
replies.txt_content: 都带学生了，上什么网课

replies.author: 黎耀成
replies.txt_content: 然而我不上网课~~略过

replies.author: Coffee_Orlane
replies.txt_content: 闹钟起床签到挂机睡觉 无限循环

replies.author: 皮特刘
replies.txt_content: 云班课 有撞软件的么？

replies.author: 细致A
replies.txt_content: 没有网课，老开心了
